ModMetaData.name: Rabbit of Caerbannog Incident (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Fuglypump
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Fuglypumps mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1259215932
- Goes well with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2096338681]Grenades Expanded[/url] - Added CE-support
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/RabbitOfCaerbannogIncident][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
This mod adds the Rabbit of Caerbannog from the movie titled [b][i]Monty Python and Holy Grail[/i][/b], published in 1974. That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!
[h1]New Incidents:[/h1] - Rabbit of Caerbannog: Spawns a killer rabbit on the edge of the map. (base chance = 2.0 with 15 day cooldown) - Rabbit of Caerbannog Pack: Spawns 2-6 killer rabbits on the edge of the map. (base chance = 2.0 with 30 day cooldown)
[h1]Rabbit of Caerbannog:[/h1] - Fierce predator with combat stats comparable to that of a bear. - Uses front paws for claw attacks in addition to bite attacks (unlike vanilla rabbit) - Spawns neutral but has 100% chance to retaliate on attack. - Spawns hungry, has fast hunger rate and will hunt for food immediately. - 75% chance to attack on failed tame attempt. - Intermediate Intelligence (release command training) - Butchering yields Caerbannog Fur which is a small downgrade compared to the stats of thrumbofur. - Only spawns through the Rabbit of Caerbannog incidents.
[h1]Mod Interactions:[/h1] - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1224175982]Wild Animal Sex[/url]: Rabbit packs will start having orgy when they first spawn and can potentially become an invasive species that takes over the entire map when left unchecked.
[h1]Mod Support: (optional)[/h1] - Compatible with [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=746425621]A Dog Said[/url] if using the mod [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=944381237]A Dog Said Easy Patcher[/url] with the correct load order.
[h1]Load Order:[/h1] - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=746425621]A Dog Said[/url] - [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=944381237]A Dog Said Easy Patcher[/url] - [b]Killer Rabbits of Caerbannog[/b] (and other animal-adding mods)
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - Coding: [b]Fuglypump[/b] - Textures and artwork: [b]Chicken Plucker[/b] - Japanese translation: [b]Proxyer[/b]
[h1]Languages:[/h1] - English - 日本語 (Japanese) - If you would like to help translate this mod please post a comment.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/2361380276][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/RabbitOfCaerbannogIncident?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url] | tags: movie-inspired
